pkgmetadata.longdescription: Brazilian Economic Time Series // It provides access to and information about the most important Brazilian economic time series - from the Getulio Vargas Foundation http://portal.fgv.br/en, the Central Bank of Brazil http://www.bcb.gov.br and the Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics http://www.ibge.gov.br. It also presents tools for managing, analysing (e.g. generating dynamic reports with a complete analysis of a series) and exporting these time series.
